price: Aseme: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Mbona umenifufua kipofu, nami nilikuwa nikiona?.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
